label.title: Label
label.description: Question or instruction to user - appears above the component. If component is repeatable, the label appears next to the input, with the number added automatically (for example, child 1)

hint.title: Hint text
hint.description: Text to help users answer a question - appears in grey under the label (like this text)

labelSummary.title: Label (Summary version)
labelSummary.description: The text used on the 'check your answers' page. Ideally a shorter version of the label text
